search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for DealMachine (dealmachine.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for DealMachine is: [https://dealmachine.com/pricing](https://dealmachine.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: DealMachine Pricing - Compare Plans and Try For Free

Green, seasoned, stuck and wanna grow?? This app will get you where you want to be!!3 months ago
star
star
star
star
star
Absolutely amazing application for investors wholesalers anybody in real estate in all stages of their career weather you’re just getting started like myself or if you already have an up and running business, and wanna take it to the next level. Of course I’m not there yet, but I can’t help to think about the possibilities once I do get there that this app or this tool well allow me to do I could write 10 pages about all the different functions in applications that DealMachine has available, but just on the surface it allows you to To find thousands of leads efficiently, organize them them gives you all the information on the spot about each Property their owner Records Skiptracing cops then gives you the option to do all the marketing in terms of mailers Cold calling. If you’re like me and getting started, I need to drive for dollars you can literally do it from your couch virtually, You can plan out routes so that way you can focus more on the properties as opposed to your route you could do it free I mean, I can go on and on about how awesome this app is if you were able to give 10 stars I would give 11
